ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
ack.p: We are thankful to the team from the Genomics Facility of the AAC at the University of Guelph, and particularly to Jeffrey Gross for all suggestions and recommendations during library preparation and MiSeq runs. We thank Jocelyn Kelly and Mireille Marcotte for kindly reviewing earlier versions of the manuscript. We are also grateful to Jessica Castellanos‚ÄêLabarcena for helping with the analyses in R and the scripting. We acknowledge the assistance of all members of the Hanner Laboratory during data collection.
